ED_Title: Rights of reply to addresses by Heads of State
ED_DecisionText: At its 2nd plenary meeting, on 13 September 2024, the General Assembly took note of the information provided in paragraph 53 of the report of the General Committee  (Footnote: A/79/250.) concerning rights of reply to addresses by Heads of State.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/79/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
